attributes.action: Ban mobile phone companies from reintroducing roaming charges in EU countries
attributes.additional_details: Legislate to correct this omission from our Brexit implementation.
attributes.background: Avoid companies taking advantage of the UK leaving the EU to charge British people more. Early in the Brexit debate assurances were made that leaving the EU would not affect roaming charges in Europe. Don’t allow these companies to undermine the public’s view of Brexit with this ‘penalty charge’.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594547
